remarks: A fraction of complex numbers is zero iff its numerator is.  Deduction form of ~ diveqap0 .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 19-Mar-2020.)
statement:
divcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divclapd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B # 0 ) $.
diveqap0ad $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) = 0 <-> A = 0 ) ) $.
